rooms.name: west-of-house
rooms.description:
You are standing in an open field west of a white house with a boarded front door.
There is a forest to the north.
There is a cave to the south.

rooms.name: forest
rooms.description:
This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.
There is a clearing to the north, and a house to the south.

rooms.name: clearing
rooms.description:
You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on the west and south.
There is a darker forest to the north, a forest to the south, and a canyon to the west.

rooms.name: canyon
rooms.description:
You are at the top of the great canyon on its south wall.
There is a beach to the west, and a clearing to the east.

rooms.name: beach
rooms.description:
You are on a small beach on the Frigid River, past the falls.
There is a faint smell of sulfur coming from the ground.
There is a clearing to the north, and a canyon to the east.

rooms.name: north-of-forest
rooms.description: You are in a very dark forest. There is a river to the north and clearing to the south

rooms.name: river
rooms.description: You are standing in a river. There is a river beach to the East. The dark forest is to the south.

rooms.name: river-beach
rooms.description: You are standing on the beach. There is nowhere to go, but west back to the river

rooms.name: cave
rooms.description: You are in the cave with passages to the east, west and south. To the north is the open field.

rooms.name: cave-east
rooms.description: You are in a strange room. It is a dead end and you can only go back the direction you came

rooms.name: cave-east
rooms.description: You are in a strange room. It is a dead end and you can only go back the direction you came

rooms.name: cave-south
rooms.description: You are in a strange room with a chest. It is locked; maybe there is a key to unlock it

rooms.name: styx
rooms.description: In front of you is the River Styx.

rooms.name: hades
rooms.description:
Welcome to Hades!

We must inform you that no one ever leaves.
You might as well end right now.

monsters.name: The Wicked Witch of the East
